title: Sutta Gully
content: Hi! I'm a first year student at PES RR campus and I have seen a lot of people mention sutta gully on the sub. What kind of food can we get there and where is it? Thanks in advance

comments.body: So it's just a gully for people who smoke?
U get any sort of junk food for a reasonable price.. jus explore it once u will have fun

It's the world's cuisine on a street

Ask for anything and you shall get
It's a small road adjacent to the college will has various eateries (many with zero hygiene).
0 hygiene but 100% variety and affordable rates. Pretty much that.
Give it time, you'll see soon
I'm in 2nd year. Forgot to remove the fresher tag.
sutta ka aur kya matlab hai bhai lol
